text: Hello! I’m new to HubSpot, evaluating it as an email dev on behalf of a client.
Hey everyone! I run a marketing agency and we do a fair bit of UI/UX and web design - looking to transition to the HubSpot CMS and see what kind of offerings I can offer my inbound clients

Hello. I would like to display report of document downloads - different documents (as CTA). Is it best pratice to have one CTA for this or should I have different CTA for each document. Additionally I would like to display different reports connected with this CTA: graph of downloaded documents, graph of downloaded documents based on some property, ...

Hey Gaber, you could use one CTA for each document. This would allow you have a tracking for each document when downloaded. Another option, you could implement event tracking for Google Analytics /Tag Manager and track them that way as well.
Hi everyone, I'm the new guy from Chile in South America
